entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of snow. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023
